actor

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • actor.Actor
        • actor.Animal

  • public class Animal
extends Actor
    Models Animals in worlds. Animals have their own properties and can also go move around Forests, eat food in Forests and carry things.
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow
